author: battibass
body:
#### PR description:

This pull-request add information to both the **ZMu** and the **ZeroBias** flavours of the Muon DPG custom-NANO.

Results from the validation of the **ZMu** ntuples are reported in the google-doc from [this DT DPG meeting](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Jt0UPgnyG99Sx3AzBuwMTWXzttqWDtnB/edit#heading=h.gjdgxs). 

The changes imply a ~1% increase in the ntuple event-size.

Results validating the additions to the **ZeroBias** ntuples are scattered in meetings of the [Muon Background Studies Group](https://indico.cern.ch/category/16135/). 

The ntuple **event-size get roughly doubled** because of this this update, but it has to be noted that **ZeroBias** ntuples are never produced in central workflows, hence event-size  is "just" a muon DPGO matter.

#### PR validation:

Beyond performance studies the ntuples were validated issuing `runTheMatrix.py -l 2500.2402`.
title: Muon DPG custom-NANO updates enabling additional studies
